mdRecord.dcterms:title: Registrum brevium tam originalium, quam judicialium: correctum & emendatum ad vetus exemplar manuscriptum,, cujus beneficio, à multis erroribus purgatum, ad usus, quibus inservit redditur accommodatius
Appendix diversa brevia
Digest des briefs originals
Registrum omniũ breuium
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Appendix (1 leaf, 59, [4] p.) and Le digest des briefs originals (1 leaf, [6], 239 p. at end) have special title-pages and separate paging. [original]
First published, 1531, under title: Registrum omniũ breuium tam originaliũ quam iudicialium. [original]
"The compilation ... has been ascribed to Ralph de Hengham."--J. G. Marvin, Legal bibliography. [original]
LAW: Copy 1: Lacks initial 4 leaves (including title-page) of Registrum brevium tam originalium and p. 229-239 of Le digest des briefs originals. [original]
LAW: Copy 2: Lacks initial 4 leaves (including title-page) of Registrum brevium tam originalium and p. 233-239 of Le digest des briefs originals. [original]
LAW: Copy 3: Lacks p. [1-4] of Le digest des briefs originals. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Great Britain. Court of Chancery.
